name: PERMλFROST
description:
An Inform Text Game  inspired by Marc Laidlaw's Epistle 3 and still currently in development for the Epistle 3 Game Jam. What you can play now is a little demo showcasing the beginning of the game, but we will continue to work on developing the later stages we have in mind.

We of course welcome any feedback, and thank you for playing!
